name: I Spy with my Little Eye

quests.name: Mining Dimension
quests.description:
We have 4 dimensions that you can visit to mine, hunt, climb, or cave (weird). 

Check out the tasks to learn how to visit them

tasks.longDescription:
Mining Dimension

A dimension with two biomes (desert and plains) and is always noon; same ores and structures as Overworld; made using the vanilla portal method but with deepslate and lit with flint-n-steel.
- Caving Dim: A safe haven dimension of Mushroom biome caves; same ores as Overworld; made with tuff and lit with flint-n-steel;
- Climbing Dim: A dimensions with two biomes (badlands and wind-swept hills) and is always noon; same ores and structures as Overworld; made with snow blocks and lit with flint-n-steel.

- Hunting Dim: A dimension with just plains, always dark, and full of juiced up, armored mobs; only vanilla ores; made with oak logs and lit with flint-n-steel; seriously, the mobs are tough and you will likely die!

However, you get good loot from slaying those mobs.
